entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
